scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run serve" "cd server && npm run server"
scripts.start: npm run serve && cd server && node server.js
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run develop" "cd client && npm run serve"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run develop" "cd client && npm run serve"
